about_the_game:
It's a dirty job, but someone's got to do it...
Death Protocol is a minimalistic, hardcore, fastpaced FPS. Get ready to paint walls in the blood of your enemies while 'cleaning' locations selected by the mysterious numbers in your head. No regenerating health bars. No bullet sponge enemies. Reward and punishment were multiplied by 10x.

Features
- Hardcore. Getting shot really hurts not just for you but also for your enemies.
- Story & Lore. Why are you receiving messages? Are you a part of a larger organization or just went insane?
- Scarce ammo. You don't have the time to reload, so make each bullet count.
- High scores. After clearing the level, your effectiveness is calculated based on time, headshots, lost health, etc.

Death Protocol was designed to create a brutal but fair FPS game experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Gore - Contains a lot of gory content that may not be appropriate for all audiences.

name: Death Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K or AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB or Intel Arc A380, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K or AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB, or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The voices in your head keep repeating numbers. You know only one way to make them stop...
